sentences.english: This project will be performed in three years.
After teaching for ten years he moved into publishing.
sentences.chinese: 執桝十年後他幹起了出版工作。

sentences.english: Will enhance the quality of Deacons through Ministers Post Systematic Seminar.
sentences.chinese: 透過長執系統化講習會來加強長執的品質。

sentences.english: Don t let a little dispute injure a great friendship.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓曉曉帝聵執損傷一份偉大地友情。

sentences.english: There is a fallacy which I shall call the ' essentialist fallacy'.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個我稱之爲“實有執”的謬論。

sentences.english: But Europe could soon take the top spot on the space junk tally.
sentences.chinese: 不過歐洲在太空垃圾排行榜上即將“執頭把交椅”。

sentences.english: American business and industry outpaced the world for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 美國的工商業一直執世界經濟之牛耳。

sentences.english: Fifthly, consultations should be better organised to improve the Council’s efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 加強協商，提高執理會效率。

sentences.english: Comfortable life, holding a poetic pen, in the time of the book down.
sentences.chinese: 愜意生活，執一支如詩的筆，於流年的書輕描淡寫。

sentences.english: All searches are conducted only on the basis of the search criteria provided in this form.
sentences.chinese: 本署只會依據在此表格內提供的查閱資料執行查冊。
